description: This file defines a React functional component named PlayerPanel that displays information about a player in a multiplayer Ludo game, including player name, color, tokens in yard/on board/in home, and highlights if the player is active.

methods.name: PlayerPanel({ player, tokens, isActive })
methods.description: React functional component displaying player information with style adjustments for active player.

ctags.name: PlayerPanel
ctags.pattern: /^export default function PlayerPanel({ player, tokens, isActive }) {$/
